body:
Kokkos installation with ```spack install --verbose kokkos@develop rocm=True std=14 amdgpu_target=gfx908``` fails on Tulip,Lyra and Redwood with 
```  >> 1132    ld.lld: error: undefined symbol: void nla::intervals::set_var_interval<(dep_intervals::with_deps_t)1>(unsigned int, dep_intervals::im_config::interval&) ```
in upstream dependency ```Z3```.
Dependencies visibile to me: ```Kokkos -> llvm-amdgpu -> Z3```
title: Building Kokkos on Frontier-like systems fails at dependency Z3
